message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I think you'll be very interested in. I'm offering it to you for $10000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $8500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my initial price. I'm willing to come down to $9250.  What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $9000 for the product.
